name: Bottomless Pitfall
description:
Bottomless Pitfall

Drop down to the endless pit; in this endless fall-er, you got to survive the fall.

How long will you survive without hitting a thing?

Goal: Don't smash yourself against the obstacles, ok.

🎮 Controls🎮

⌨ Arrow Keys / WASD To MOVE

💡Here is an Idea💡

 Post Your high scores on social media and mention @emanvidmaker to see whos is the world record holder (Screenshot Required)

🥇Current World Record Holder🥇

@emanvidmaker  64 points (24 of April 2021) Source: The Game Trailer
